The RGH, this is a hack to glitch, is a chip to your colsole that you can copy games to external or intenal hard disk and play the games, included the xbla, emulators PAL or ntcs games etc.

Adding the full game to the trial demo won't allow you to play the full version. It has to be activated. You can use Horizon(xboxmb.com) to do it but it will just report errors. You need jtag or RBH consoles.
